Author: Logan Summerlin
Name: Dailies Checklist
Punchline: Track your daily and weekly FFXIV activities in one convenient overlay.
Description:
A quality-of-life overlay that helps you track daily and weekly reset activities in Final Fantasy XIV. Features include:

- Categorized checklist for daily and weekly tasks
- Auto-detection for supported activities (roulettes, cactpot, beast tribes, etc.)
- Manual tracking for activities that cannot be auto-detected
- Automatic reset at daily/weekly reset times
- Persistent state across sessions
- Customizable task list and UI settings

Commands:
/dailies - Toggle the main checklist window
